title: Did the Union complain that Trump said "American" too many times in Union State?
subtitle: The unreliable websites distorted the content of the American Civil Liberties Union ' s cash response to President Trump ' s speech.
author: David Emery
vclaim: In response to President Trump ' s 2018 speech in the state of the Federation, the American Civil Liberties Union has issued a complaint that he has used the word "American" more than 80 times.
